snippet.title: EVERSPACE™ Greenlight UE4 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
+++ UPDATE +++

Many thanks for your continued support. Now we need you to spread the word about our Kickstarter campaign that has just launched: http://bit.ly/EVRSPC_KS

+++ UPDATE +++
WOOHOOO! We've been greenlit today with 15,054 YES votes - at a staggering 86% positive feedback ratio and more than 1,000 heart-warming comments about EVERSPACE within two weeks! 

Many thanks for your continued support. Now we need you to spread the word about our Kickstarter campaign that has just launched: http://bit.ly/EVRSPC_KS

+++ ORIGINAL ENTRY +++
EVERSPACE™ [http://bit.ly/EVRSPC] is a rogue-like 3D space shooter with non-linear story-telling based on Unreal Engine 4. It is brought to you by the creators of the critically acclaimed Galaxy on Fire series with millions of players all around the globe (Metacritics score: 90 for Galaxy on Fire 2). 

We have been working on EVERSPACE™ for more than six months and all video footage shown is actual gameplay of the Pre-Alpha. 

Please vote for us to get Greenlight on Steam [http://bit.ly/EVRSPC_GL] now and support us on Kickstarter starting August, 6th. 

If you want to kept in the loop please sign-up on http://everspace-game.com - we'd really appreciate your interest and support!
